content: That's a great point about automating reporting tasks and freeing up time for strategic thinking. I think I can definitely see how Tableau Creator can help me achieve that. As a Marketing Specialist, I've been responsible for creating regular reports for my supervisor and other stakeholders. If I can automate some of those tasks, I can focus more on high-impact projects and contribute to the organization's growth. Do you think I can also use Tableau Creator to analyze customer data and gain more insights into their behavior and preferences?
